app.name: Advent of Homebrew
app.long_description:
Advent of Code solutions, as Nintendo Wii homebrew. https://github.com/jolleyjames/advent-of-homebrew
* * * * * * * Controls * * * * * * *
D-pad Up/Down: Cycle years or days A: Choose year or day B: Go back 1 or 2: Choose part 1 or part 2 of puzzle HOME: Return to system menu at end of puzzle
Hold B at startup to mute background music.
